tool_description: Elevate your application with our RealTime Booking.com API, the market's fastest route to live accommodation data. This robust API grants immediate access to a world of listings, prices, and availability, ensuring your service offers the latest information with unmatched reliability. Perfect for travel platforms and apps seeking to enhance user experience with real-time booking features. Get started now and stay ahead in the dynamic world of travel!
name: BOOKING COM API
title: BOOKING COM API

api_list.name: hotelAvailability
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns the cheapest available room for each hotel matching your check-in and check-out dates. You can search for hotels in a city, or for a specific list of (upto 300) hotels by hotel_ids. Here you will find whether the price included breakfast or other meals, as well as whether it is possible to cancel for free. It is possible to have a breakdown of the price returned by this endpoint and to filter by property types and/or hotel facilities.

Additional information available (via extras parameter) are:
 * add_cheapest_breakfast_rate: ** DEPRECATED ** Please use `add_filtered_rate=breakfast` instead from v2.7+ *Deprecated in version 2.7.*
 * block_payment_options: Gives access to the payment options information for the block. Requires room_details extras option *Added in version 2.9.*
 * hotel_amenities: Show amenities provided by hotel
 * hotel_details: Show extra hotel details
 * payment_terms: Show payment terms like prepay or cancellation for the room
 * room_amenities: Show amenities in the room
 * room_details: Show extra room details
 * room_policies: Show policies for the room
 * sustainability: ** PILOT MODE ** Gives access to hotel sustainability program information. Requires hotel_details extras option *Added in version 2.9.*


Available options to filter the output (via options parameter) are:
 * is_24hr: Only show hotels that have a reception that's open 24 hours/day
 * no_cc_filter: Filter to show only no_cc properties in the response. *Added in version 2.1.*
 * no_dorms: Do not show dormitory beds or rooms, or hotels that only have such rooms
 * show_test: This is used when debugging or when you are initially setting up your integration. A test hotel can be used to test all of our endpoints including making a booking

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Returns the price in this currency

optional_parameters.name: hotel_facility_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to hotels that have all provided hotel facility types. Check the values returned by `hotelFacilityTypes.hotel_facility_type_id` for the full list of valid ids.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Limit the result list to the items satisfying the specified rules

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of rows to return. NOTE: this needs to be a multiple of 100, the default number returned is 1000. When requesting 1000, there can be less than 1000 rows returned, but this does not mean the end of the resultset, instead you should keep paginating by increasing the offset by 1000 until you get a page with 0 results - that is what signifies the end.

optional_parameters.name: guest_country
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Guest country code. NOTE: after version 2.6 this is now a REQUIRED parameter. Used to accurately display the best prices and price details for people from that country.

optional_parameters.name: guest_ip
optional_parameters.description: Guest IP address Used to accurately display the best prices and price details for people from that country. (same behaviour as guest_country, but we detect where we think that IP address is from)

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description: Show only hotels having price higher than or equal to this value in the currency specified. Prices slightly below the criterion may be returned due to currency conversion adjustments.

optional_parameters.name: mealplan
optional_parameters.description: Only show blocks with the selected meal plan

optional_parameters.name: district_ids
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Limit the result list to the specified districts. You can get the list of district_ids from districts.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Show the results in this language. Note: only some cities are translated. Please check the \"Possible Values\" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: user_platform
optional_parameters.description: The user's platform. (desktop, mobile, mobile-app)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: The options for this request. See the documentation for more details about each option.

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: The extra items for this request. See the documentation for more details about each extra.

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: The way to order your results. (distance, popularity, price, ranking, review_score, stars). NOTE: When ordering by distance please make sure to specify latitude and longitude!

optional_parameters.name: checkout
optional_parameters.description: (Required) The departure date. Must be later than {checkin}. Must be between 1 and 30 days after {checkin}. Must be within 500 days in the future and in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

optional_parameters.name: region_ids
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Limit the result list to the specified regions. You can get the list of region_ids form regions.

optional_parameters.name: city_ids
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Limit the result list to the specified cities. You can get the list of city_ids from cities.

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description: Show only hotels having price lower than or equal to this value in the currency specified. Prices slightly above the criterion may be returned due to currency conversion adjustments.

optional_parameters.name: room2
optional_parameters.description: Which guests to put in this room. Similar parameters available for up to 30 rooms - room3..room30. See \"room1\" param for detailed description

optional_parameters.name: room1
optional_parameters.description: (Required) A comma separated array of guests to stay in this room where \"A\" represents an adult and an integer represents a child. eg room1=A,A,4 would be a room with 2 adults and 1 four year-old child. Child age numbers are 0..17.

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these property types

optional_parameters.name: room_facility_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to hotels that have all provided room facility types. Check the values returned by `roomFacilityTypes.room_facility_type_id` for the full list of valid ids.

optional_parameters.name: stars
optional_parameters.description: Limit to hotels with the given number(s) of stars. (1-5)

optional_parameters.name: add_filtered_rate
optional_parameters.description: For each hotel add a separate rate field with those filters applied

optional_parameters.name: checkin
optional_parameters.description: (Required) The arrival date. Must be within 500 days in the future and in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

optional_parameters.name: countries
optional_parameters.description: Limit the result list to these countries, ISO alpha2

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Specify a latitude (as well as a longitude and radius) to do searches around a specific location.

optional_parameters.name: affiliate_id
optional_parameters.description: Application affiliate id that you wish this request to be tracked against.

optional_parameters.name: order_dir
optional_parameters.description: The direction you wish for your order_by parameter to be ordered in. Possible values are order_dir=asc for ascending or order_dir=desc for descending

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to offset the results by. NOTE: this needs to be 0 or a multiple of 100. Eg. rows=1000&offset=0 will be first 1000 results. rows=1000&offset=1000 will be the next 1000. You should continue to increment the offset to paginate, and you should use the value of rows as the number you increase by each time.

optional_parameters.name: no_rooms
optional_parameters.description: The only group will be split in the given number of rooms automatically

optional_parameters.name: airport
optional_parameters.description: Limit the result list to surroundings of specified airport IATA code.

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Specify a longitude (as well as a latitude and radius) to do searches around a specific location.

optional_parameters.name: min_review_score
optional_parameters.description: Show only hotels with review_score >= that. min_review_score should be in the range 1 to 10. Values are rounded down: min_review_score 7.8 will result in properties with review scores of 7 and up.

optional_parameters.name: show_only_deals
optional_parameters.description: Only show rates that are deals of given types

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The radius in Km to search around the specified latitude and longitude. The minimum value (and the default) is 15 and the maximum is 100.

optional_parameters.name: hotel_ids
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Limit the result list to up to 1000 specified hotels where they have availability for the specified guests and dates.

optional_parameters.name: landmark_ids
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Limit the result list to surroundings of specified landmark

api_list.name: facilityTypes
api_list.description: Returns facility types names and their translations.

required_parameters.name: languages
required_parameters.description: Limit the results to these languages. Please check the \"Possible Values\" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: facility_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these facility types.

api_list.name: roomTypes
api_list.description: Returns room types names and their translations.

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these languages. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: room_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these room types.

api_list.name: roomFacilityTypes
api_list.description: Returns room facility types names and their translations.

optional_parameters.name: facility_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these facility types.

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these languages. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: room_facility_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these room facility types.

api_list.name: chainTypes
api_list.description: Returns a list of hotel chains (in English).

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return. This can be used together with {offset} to get the data in parts.

optional_parameters.name: chain_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these chains.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Where in the resulting list to start. This can be used together with {rows} to get the data in parts.

api_list.name: changedHotels
api_list.description:
This call returns all hotel ids which has closed or data has changed since the given timestamp. The results can be filtered by either city_ids, region_ids or countries.

The hotel data that are tracked for changes enclose:

**hotel_info**
* Main photo, logo photo, star rating
* Checkin and checkout time
* Closed status (also for new hotels), ranking, policy changes, hotel contract with Booking.com, hotel type
* Name, address, country, city, currency code, zip code, default language, longitude, latitude
* Page name at Booking.com

**hotel_description**
* Property license numbers
* Hotel descriptions (and their translations)

**hotel_facilities**
* Hotel facilities (and their translations)

**hotel_photos**
* Hotel photos added or removed
* Photo tags changed

**room_info**
* Room type, pricing, bedding, bookable status, ranking
* Counts of bedrooms / bathrooms
* Person capacity

**room_description**
* Apartment license numbers
* Room descriptions (and their translations)

**room_photos**
* Room photos added or removed
* Photo tags changed

**room_facilities**
* Room specific facilities (and their translations)

**payment_types**
* Various payment types associated with the hotel

NOTE:The closed hotels can reopen, the hotel_ids for such hotel will reappear in changed hotels list.

optional_parameters.name: city_ids
optional_parameters.description: City ids to filter the result by.

optional_parameters.name: region_ids
optional_parameters.description: Region ids to filter the result by.

optional_parameters.name: last_change
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Timestamp by which to slice the results. Ids of all hotels whose data changed since this timestamp will be returned by the call. Other optional filters also apply. There is a limit to this timestamp to two days in the past. If requested timestamp is older than two days, a user error will be returned. The timestamp is in Amsterdam time zone (CET).

optional_parameters.name: countries
optional_parameters.description: Country codes to filter the result by.

api_list.name: paymentTypes
api_list.description: Returns a list of payments (in English). Only payments with {bookable} set to 1, can be used in processBooking. For processBooking, we always support Visa, Mastercard and American Express.

optional_parameters.name: payment_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these payments.

api_list.name: reviews
api_list.description:
Returns reviews for specified hotel_ids and filters. Available filters are country, reviewers' type, language of the review, lower and upper bound of the review score, and timestamp of the last change to the review. The 'last_change' output field will only be displayed if the last_change=... input parameter is set.


Additional information available (via extras parameter) are:
 * review_score_word: This will render score of a review to its description, localized to the language passed via language=... (default: 'en').

optional_parameters.name: hotel_ids
optional_parameters.description: (Required) List of hotel ids for which reviews should be displayed.

optional_parameters.name: headline_word_count
optional_parameters.description: Truncates the headline to the given number of words. The default value is 5 words. If the headline was trimmed, it will have "..." appended to it. If this input parameter is equal to zero, then no truncation will be done.

optional_parameters.name: affiliate_id
optional_parameters.description: May be used to specify the affiliate_id that should be used instead of the default one.

optional_parameters.name: score_upper_bound
optional_parameters.description: Limits the reviews to those having score lesser or equal to this value. Possible values are real numbers in range [1 - 10].

optional_parameters.name: last_change
optional_parameters.description: Limits the reviews to those changed after the given timestamp.

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: Specify here what extra items of the result should be included. See the endpoint description for more detailed information about each extra.

optional_parameters.name: reviewer_type
optional_parameters.description: Limits reviews to those written by specific reviewer type.

optional_parameters.name: character_count
optional_parameters.description: Truncates the cons/pros from the review to the given number of characters. The default value is 200 characters. If cons or pros are trimmed, they will have "..." appended to them. If this input parameter is equal to zero, then no truncation will be done.

optional_parameters.name: score_lower_bound
optional_parameters.description: Limits the reviews to those having score greater or equal to this value. Possible values are real numbers in range [1 - 10].

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Limits reviews to those written in this language (default: 'en'). Also sets the language of extras=review_score_word. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of rows to return. NOTE: this needs to be a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Limits reviews to those written by bookers from the given country.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to offset the results by. NOTE: this needs to be 0 or a multiple of 100.

api_list.name: blockAvailability
api_list.description:
This endpoint is where you find a list of all bookable or available rooms at a property. A room can have multiple blocks, as a block is a combination of the meal, cancellation policy, occupancy and other things. You can find detailed information about one hotel per search (detail_level) which will return most of the information needed to replicate the booking.com property page. If you want to search multiple hotels, you can, but you get less detail. For searching multiple hotels, it is recommended to use hotelAvailability.)

Additional information available (via extras parameter) are:
 * additional_room_info: Show the room size and bedding info in the result
 * addon_type: Show the addon type in the addons records, if returned
 * addons: Show addon information for blocks
 * address_required: Show an indication per hotel if the user needs to enter his address in order to book an hotel
 * all_extra_charges: Show all extra charges, even if not computable. If not computable, do not show the total amount, but include all the other details
 * all_prices: Show total incremental price with split pricing, when split pricing is activated
 * block_payment_options: Shows payment options for each block. *Added in version 2.9.*
 * cancellation_info: Show detailed cancellation timeline for each block, including fees and datetimes
 * cc_required: Show cc_required field for hotels
 * deal_flash: Show flash deals to partners
 * deal_lastm: Show lastm deals to partners
 * deal_smart: Show smart deals to partners
 * extra_beds: Show extra beds in group recommendations
 * extra_charges: Show breakdown of extra charges for each block
 * facilities: Show facilities
 * group_recommendations: Show recommendations for group bookers
 * if_domestic_no_cc: Show indication if the hotel qualifies for domestic no credit card
 * if_no_cc_allowed: Show indication if the hotel qualifies for no credit card reservation
 * important_information: Show important information
 * internet: Show internet/wifi availability
 * max_children_free: Shows the maximum number of children allowed for free
 * max_children_free_age: Shows the age limit used for deciding whether children stay for free in a room. -1 is returned when children can not stay for free.
 * max_rooms_in_reservation: Show max number of rooms in one reservation
 * mealplans: Show half-board, full-board and all inclusive mealplan information in the output
 * net_price: Show net_price in extra charges
 * number_of_rooms_left: Show the number of rooms left
 * payment_terms: Show the payment terms name and the description for cancellation and prepay terms.
 * photos: Show 1 room photo even if detail_level=0
 * policies: Show policies
 * postcard_photo: Show url for postcard photo only if high resolution photo for this format is available, otherwise skip it (requires detail_level=1 or extras=photos)
 * prepayment_info: Show prepayment timeline, including fees and datetime, for each block.
 * rack_rates: Show rack rates in the output. Using this parameter may significantly affect performance
 * room_type_id: Show room type id
 * show_conditional_charges: Shows conditional charges in extra charge breakdown. *Added in version 2.9.*
 * smoking_status: Show the no-smoking bit in the results per block. Possible values are: 0 - "unknown", 1 - "smoking" or 2 - "non-smoking"

optional_parameters.name: room1
optional_parameters.description: Which guests to put in which rooms. Syntax: comma-separated list, A for each adult, a number in the range 0..17 for each child.If you use this parameter,then you should add `guest_quantities` to processBooking call, otherwise per-person included charges may cause pricing problems, causing the booking to fail. NOTE: After version 2.6 either this or `guest_qty` needs to be provided.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Returns the prices in this currency, in addition to the hotel currency

optional_parameters.name: is_24hr
optional_parameters.description: If set to 1, then require all matching hotels to have 24-hour front desks.

optional_parameters.name: show_test
optional_parameters.description: Show blocks from test hotels (useful for debugging).

optional_parameters.name: checkin
optional_parameters.description: (Required) The arrival date. Must be within 500 days in the future and in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

optional_parameters.name: show_only_test
optional_parameters.description: Show blocks from only test hotels (useful for debugging).

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: The options for this request. See the documentation for more details about each option.

optional_parameters.name: num_rooms
optional_parameters.description: Takes a number of rooms to put guests into

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Preferred System of Measurement.

optional_parameters.name: allow_past
optional_parameters.description: Allow the search to work for dates of yesterday when you are searching for after midnight. This works until 2am in the timezone of the hotel.

optional_parameters.name: user_platform
optional_parameters.description: The user's platform. (desktop, mobile, mobile-app)

optional_parameters.name: guest_qty
optional_parameters.description: Number of guests for which blocks will be found. The total number of guests is used for calculating city tax charges. It is specified as an array of guest numbers. If you use this parameter and make bookings through the API, you should also set the exact same value in the guest_quantities parameter for the processBooking call, otherwise per-person included charges may result in pricing problems, causing the booking to fail.  NOTE: After version 2.6 either this or `room1` needs to be provided.

optional_parameters.name: checkout
optional_parameters.description: (Required) The departure date. Must be later than {checkin}. Must be between 1 and 30 days after {checkin}. Must be within 500 days in the future and in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

optional_parameters.name: affiliate_id
optional_parameters.description: Application affiliate id

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Specify the language for: block_id, policies, room texts and hotel descriptions. Note: not all text is translated in all languages. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: The extra items for this request. See the documentation for more details about each extra.

optional_parameters.name: hotel_ids
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Hotel IDs. The maximum number of ids allowed can be adjusted uppon request up to a maximum of 1000. Defaults to 1.

optional_parameters.name: limit_incremental_prices
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of incremental prices returned per block. Added for meta partners that only need the first one.

optional_parameters.name: https_photos
optional_parameters.description: Return requested photo URLs with the HTTPS protocol.

optional_parameters.name: block_ids
optional_parameters.description: Return only availability hits with these particular block IDs

optional_parameters.name: guest_ip
optional_parameters.description: Guest IP address for determining guest country and showing the best price for that user and obeying laws regarding the display of taxes and fees.

optional_parameters.name: detail_level
optional_parameters.description: Block's information detail level. If set to 1 returns policy, photos and texts information per block. This parameter cannot be set to 1 if hotel_ids is greater than 1. Please note that from v2.6 this parameter validates as integer enforcing that only numeric values will be accepted.

optional_parameters.name: guest_cc
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Guest country code. NOTE: after version 2.6 this is now a REQUIRED parameter. Prices will be adjusted, according to the country laws regarding the display of taxes and fees.

api_list.name: districts
api_list.description:
Returns all the districts where Booking.com offers hotels.

Additional information available (via extras parameter) are:
 * location: Latitude and longitude

optional_parameters.name: district_types
optional_parameters.description: Limit the type of districts.

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of rows to return. NOTE: this needs to be a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: countries
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these countries.

optional_parameters.name: city_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these cities.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to offset the results by. NOTE: this needs to be 0 or a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description: Show translations for these languages. Note: translations are not available for all the languages. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: Returns extra results.

optional_parameters.name: district_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these districts.

api_list.name: reviewScores
api_list.description:
Gives information about review scores for specified hotel_ids and filter. The information consists of score breakdown per reviewer_type and review questions, and overall score distribution per score value (1 - 10).

The available filter is input parameter reviewer_type=... . It allows generating review score information for just one reviewer type.

Language in which the response is rendered can be controlled with the input parameter language=... (default: 'en'). Setting the language will reflect on the output fields question and review_score_word.

One additional output field can be requested with input parameter extras=review_score_word.


Additional information available (via extras parameter) are:
 * review_score_word: This will append interpretation of each score in the score breakdown, localized to the language passed via language=... (default: 'en').

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: Specify here what extra items of the result should be included. See the endpoint description for more detailed information about each extra.

optional_parameters.name: affiliate_id
optional_parameters.description: Can be used to specify the affiliate id that should be used instead of the default one.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Code of the language used to render response. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: reviewer_type
optional_parameters.description: Limits reviews to those written by specific reviewer type.

optional_parameters.name: hotel_ids
optional_parameters.description: (Required) List of hotel ids for which review score information should be displayed.

api_list.name: countries
api_list.description: Returns all the countries where booking.com offers hotels.

optional_parameters.name: countries
optional_parameters.description: Limit the result list to the specified country.

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of rows to return. NOTE: this needs to be a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description: Show translations for these languages. Note: translations are not available for all the languages. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to offset the results by. NOTE: this needs to be 0 or a multiple of 100.

api_list.name: hotelTypes
api_list.description: Returns hotel types names and their translations.

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of rows to return. NOTE: this needs to be a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these languages. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to offset the results by. NOTE: this needs to be 0 or a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: hotel_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these hotel types.

api_list.name: cities
api_list.description:
Returns a list of cities where Booking.com offers hotels.

Additional information available (via extras parameter) are:
 * location: Latitude and longitude.
 * timezone: Timezone of the city.

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: Returns extra results mentioned in this.

optional_parameters.name: city_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these cities.

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description: Show translations for these languages. Note: translations are not available for all the languages. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to offset the results by. NOTE: this needs to be 0 or a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of rows to return. NOTE: this needs to be a multiple of 100. In this procedure, multiple translations for one city constitute one row (so rows=1000 returns 8000 rows if all languages are selected).

optional_parameters.name: countries
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these countries.

api_list.name: regions
api_list.description: Returns all the regions where Booking.com offers hotels.

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of rows to return. NOTE: this needs to be a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description: Show translations for these languages. Note: translations are not available for all the languages. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: countries
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these countries.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to offset the results by. NOTE: this needs to be 0 or a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: region_types
optional_parameters.description: Limit the result list to the specified region_type: island, province, free_region.

optional_parameters.name: region_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these regions.

api_list.name: hotels
api_list.description:
This call returns the hotel and room data. By default, only hotel_id is returned in the output. One of the argument: hotel_ids, city_ids, country_ids, region_ids, district_ids, chain_ids is mandatory. Additional data needs to be requested via extras parameter.

The data is returned in English by default.


Additional information available (via extras parameter) are:
 * credit_card_exceptions: Gives information about Hotel Policy for credit card exceptions for domestic travellers. This can only be requested along with hotel_info
 * hotel_description
 * hotel_description_formatted: Same as hotel_description but with line breaks *Added in version 2.5.*
 * hotel_facilities
 * hotel_info
 * hotel_photos
 * hotel_policies
 * key_collection_info
 * payment_details
 * room_description
 * room_facilities
 * room_info
 * room_photos
 * sustainability: ** PILOT MODE ** Gives access to hotel sustainability program information. Required hotel_info extras option *Added in version 2.9.*

optional_parameters.name: hotel_ids
optional_parameters.description: A list of up to 1000 hotel ids.

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: Returns extra bits of information about hotels.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of rows to offset the results by. NOTE: this needs to be 0 or a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of rows to return. NOTE: this needs to be a multiple of 100.

optional_parameters.name: hotel_facility_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to hotels that have all of provided hotel_facility_type_ids.

optional_parameters.name: region_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these regions.

optional_parameters.name: chain_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these chains.

optional_parameters.name: district_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these districts.

optional_parameters.name: hotel_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limits the results to hotels of a certain type: Appartment, Hostel, etc. Use the numeric id codes returned by /hotelTypes.

optional_parameters.name: city_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these cities.

optional_parameters.name: country_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these country codes (cc1).

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The language code to return the results in. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

api_list.name: autocomplete
api_list.description:
Returns destination and theme information as result of a free text search, in the same manner as the Booking.com's destination search would.

The result describes up to five destinations. Destination descriptions allow either redirecting the guest to Booking.com's website, or using it on your own website.

If requested, the themes are appended after the destination search results.


Additional information available (via extras parameter) are:
 * endorsements: The top 10 endorsements for destinations that have them.
 * forecast: Each city's forecast for today
 * themes: Also include themes that match the {text} input parameter. Themes are keyword-based groups of destinations. In results, they will offer label (theme name), top_destination ids, and a total number of destinations for the theme.
 * timezones: The timezone of each destination.

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: Specify here what extra items of the result should be included. See the endpoint description for more detailed information about each extra.

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: (Required) 2

optional_parameters.name: affiliate_id
optional_parameters.description: Partner affiliate id that will be appended to the search page URLs.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Language code in which to display the results. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.

optional_parameters.name: guest_country
optional_parameters.description: Guest's country code.

api_list.name: hotelFacilityTypes
api_list.description: Returns hotel facility types names and their translations.

optional_parameters.name: hotel_facility_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these hotel facility types.

optional_parameters.name: facility_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these facility types.

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description: Limit the results to these languages. Please check the "Possible Values" section of the documentation for the accepted language codes.
